Title: Allows access to juvenile delinquency records for the purposes of a firearm background check
Summary: Allows access to juvenile delinquency records for the purposes of a firearm background check for an applicant who is under the age of twenty-two.
LawCode: Amd ยง380.1, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to allowing access to juvenile delinquency records for the purposes of a firearm background check
